title: Sweet victory: England vs All Black, Saturday November 27th., 1993.
brief_description: In November 1993, at the historic rugby ground at Twickenham, England faced the legendary All Blacks of New Zealand in a mighty contest. Having previously swept aside all comers on their tour of England, the All Blacks thrashed Scotland one week prior to the match with England. Led by Will Carling, for a record 36th. time, England’s new look side were very much the underdogs. Nevertheless, it was to be England’s day, and helped by the passionate support of a vocal home crowd, the All Blacks were defeated. Relive the many memorable moments of this historic match.
